form.name: TDSData
form.attr: Enter TDS Data from your assigned location

attrdef.name: Latitude
attrdef.attr: The latitude of your sampling location.

attrdef.name: Longitude
attrdef.attr: The longitude of your sampling location.

attrdef.name: TDS
attrdef.attr: The Total Disssolved Solids in parts per million.

attrdef.name: City
attrdef.attr: The city of the mailing address

attrdef.name: State
attrdef.attr: The state for the mailing address

attrdef.name: ZipCode
attrdef.attr: The 5 digit postal code of the mailing address.

form.name: EnterEMail
form.attr: Enters a name and associated email address.

attrdef.name: FirstName
attrdef.attr: First name of the person to contact

attrdef.name: LastName
attrdef.attr: Last name of the person to contact

form.name: EnterTimeInterval
form.attr: Enter a starting and ending time interval

form.name: EnterLong
form.attr: Enters a long value for testing

form.name: Login
form.attr: Login in for the requested container

form.name: enterRemoteDirectory
form.attr: Enters a VDAB directory for a Remote Container.

form.name: enterRemoteFlow
form.attr: Enters a flow path (FlowGroup/FlowName) for a Remote Container.

attrdef.name: FlowPath
attrdef.attr: The complete path to the flow including FlowGroup/FlowName.

form.name: addUserRole
form.attr: Add a role for a specified user

attrdef.name: User
attrdef.attr: The name of the user who will have a role added

attrdef.name: Role
attrdef.attr: Select the user role for this user.

form.name: removeUserRole
form.attr: Remove a role for a named users

attrdef.name: User
attrdef.attr: The name of the user who will have access for a role removed.

form.name: SetParentContainer
form.attr: Sets the parent container for this container by specifying its location which includes the domain and port. If not specified the port is assume to be the default port of 1775.

attrdef.name: ParentLocation
attrdef.attr: Location of the parent which includes the domain and port. If not specified the port is assume to be the default port of 1775.

form.name: SetEventDB
form.attr: Sets or resets the event database used for event persistence

attrdef.name: PersistenceType
attrdef.attr: Sets the type of the event persistence. Currently only SQL and MongoDB are supported. Future options will include flatfile and HDFS.

form.name: MakeContainerGroup
form.attr: Defines this container as the parent of a container group

attrdef.name: ContainerGroupName
attrdef.attr: Sets the label or name for this group of containers.

attrdef.name: GroupDescription
attrdef.attr: Provides a complete description of this container group.

form.name: VDABDownload
form.attr: Captures user information prior to downloading VDAB.

attrdef.name: Username
attrdef.attr: OPTIONAL: If you are a registered VDAB user enter your Username.

attrdef.name: Password
attrdef.attr: OPTIONAL: If you are a registered VDAB user enter your password.

form.name: LoadModule
form.attr: Load a package containing special VDAB node type or Library

attrdef.name: PackageType
attrdef.attr: The type of package to download

attrdef.name: ModuleName
attrdef.attr: The package that should be loaded. Pick from available packages.

form.name: ConfigureContainer
form.attr: Enter data to define the initial configuration of a new container

attrdef.name: AccountName
attrdef.attr: The account associated with this account.

attrdef.name: Administrator
attrdef.attr: The name of the user who is the primary administrator for this container.

attrdef.name: Password
attrdef.attr: The password for the primary administrative user.

attrdef.name: SecurityClass
attrdef.attr: Creates an initial security classification. Private, Restricted, Standard, Public.

attrdef.name: ContainerPublicName
attrdef.attr: The public name associated with this container

attrdef.name: ContainerLocation
attrdef.attr: The external domain and port that can be used to access this container separated by a semicolon.

attrdef.name: ParentLocation
attrdef.attr: The external domain and port for the parent container for this container. The domain and port should be separated by a semicolon.

attrdef.name: AccountName
attrdef.attr: The assigned account name. For personal accounts this is not needed

attrdef.name: Username
attrdef.attr: The username of the person responsible for this account. Do not include spaces

attrdef.name: Password
attrdef.attr: The password for the person associated with the account.

attrdef.name: City
attrdef.attr: The city of the account owner

attrdef.name: State
attrdef.attr: The state of the account owner

attrdef.name: Country
attrdef.attr: The country of the account owner

attrdef.name: PostalCode
attrdef.attr: The postal code of the account owner

form.name: RegisterUser
form.attr: Associates a user with a VDAB Client, creating the user if necessary. If the user is newly created you will receive a confirmation EMail.

attrdef.name: Username
attrdef.attr: The user name associated with this user. It should not include spaces and must be at least 8 characters.

attrdef.name: AccountType
attrdef.attr: The account type. Either personal or corporate

attrdef.name: AccountName
attrdef.attr: Account name is hidden and will be set to the user name.

attrdef.name: Password
attrdef.attr: A password. This must be at least 8 digits and contain letters, numbers and a special character.

attrdef.name: AccountType
attrdef.attr: The account type. Either personal or corporate

attrdef.name: AccountName
attrdef.attr: The assigned account name. For personal accounts this is not needed

attrdef.name: Username
attrdef.attr: The username of the person responsible for this account. Do not include spaces

attrdef.name: Password
attrdef.attr: The password for the person associated with the account.

attrdef.name: CloudContainer
attrdef.attr: If set creates a complimentary VDAB cloud container.

attrdef.name: City
attrdef.attr: The city of the account owner

attrdef.name: State
attrdef.attr: The state of the account owner

attrdef.name: Country
attrdef.attr: The country of the account owner

attrdef.name: PostalCode
attrdef.attr: The postal code of the account owner

form.name: ActivateContainer
form.attr: Allows initial activation of the selected container. Select from previously purchased activation keys

attrdef.name: AccountName
attrdef.attr: The account name given to you by MJA Technology.

attrdef.name: Password
attrdef.attr: The password assigned to your account.

attrdef.name: ActivationKey
attrdef.attr: Your system activation key which you should have received in the email confirming your registration

attrdef.name: ContainerName
attrdef.attr: The label assigned to this container.

attrdef.name: ContainerLocation
attrdef.attr: The address and port where this container will be located.

attrdef.name: ParentLocation
attrdef.attr: OPTIONAL: The address and port of the parent container.

form.name: RegisterAccount
form.attr: Associates a VDAB Client with a user and account and saves this information. Only personal accounts are currently supported

attrdef.name: AccountType
attrdef.attr: The account type. Either personal or corporate

attrdef.name: AccountName
attrdef.attr: The assigned account name. For personal accounts this is not needed

attrdef.name: Username
attrdef.attr: The username of the person responsible for this account. Do not include spaces

attrdef.name: Password
attrdef.attr: The password for the person associated with the account.

form.name: SelectContainerDirectory
form.attr: Select container location and container directory

attrdef.name: DemoVersion
attrdef.attr: Is this a demo version only?

attrdef.name: Password
attrdef.attr: The password for the account owner

attrdef.name: Memory
attrdef.attr: Maximum available container memory in megabytes.

form.name: PurchaseContainerKeys
form.attr: Container keys can be purchased - All payment information will be handled using secure...

form.name: PropagationAndPersistance
form.attr: Describe how far event data should be propogated and how long it should be persisted

attrdef.name: PropagateTo
attrdef.attr: Selects how far an event shoud be propagated. Read the EventWatershed documentation to learn about the body of water propagation types.

attrdef.name: RelevantFor
attrdef.attr: Selects how long the event will be retained. After this time is up it will be purged from all systems.

attrdef.name: SourceLabel
attrdef.attr: This allows designating a source label that is not the same as the Node name.

form.name: SaveFileLocally
form.attr: Identify the local directory where you would like to save the file

form.name: ScanLocalContainers
form.attr: Finds VDAB containers located on your subnet. Enter the first and last IP to check

form.name: AddContainerShortcut
form.attr: Enter container information to create a shortcut on your desktop. Enter either a) the public name or b) the domain and port

form.name: AddGroupShortcut
form.attr: Enter group information to create a shortcut on your desktop. Enter either a) the public name or b) the domain and port

form.name: SetRemoteAccess
form.attr: Entering this information will allow access to the container outside of the local network. The router will also to be set to forward the ports

form.name: CreateFlow
form.attr: Enter the flow name and description to create a flow

form.name: StartInterval
form.attr: Enter an interval name to be started

form.name: RegisterContainer
form.attr: Associates a container with an account and assigns an activation key to the account

attrdef.name: AccountName
attrdef.attr: The name of the account which will be associated with this container.

attrdef.name: Administrator
attrdef.attr: The primary administrator for this container

attrdef.name: Password
attrdef.attr: The password of the primary administrator for this container.

attrdef.name: ActivationKey
attrdef.attr: Your system activation key which you should have received in the email confirming your registration
